featured.text: He then moved to New York City, where he worked as a freelance illustrator with Harper’s Weekly, a popular magazine of the time, and began painting.
Showing great talent in painting, Moran was soon hired as an illustrator at Scribner’s Monthly, and later appointed chief illustrator by age 34.
He first established his reputation as an illustrator in his hometown of Boston. 51.
He is considered the greatest illustrator in the history of American art.

definition.zh_def: 插畫家，專門創作插圖的人。
definition.en_def: An illustrator is a person who creates images or drawings to accompany text or convey ideas.
definition.example: The illustrator brought the story to life with beautiful images.
